name: Gravity Trance
description:
Gravity Trance is a minimalist puzzle game which is played by rotating the mazes.

It’s a complete mind bent exercise to challenge yourself to merge the character and yellow checkpoint. As you proceed further towards next level, you might feel dizzy to think more to solve the puzzle and ultimately would become more harder for you.

It’s not all that easy as it seems to be. It would prove to be pretty hard, tough and challenging play

Let’s take a closer look at the toughest categories that are waiting for you:

Some of the levels really sharpens your mind having the spikes thorns within the living wheel shape,

NOTE :
1. BE CAUTIOUS TO AVOID THE COLLISION OF THE PINK CHARACTER WITH THE SPIKEY THORNS
2. COLLISION OF THE YELLOW CHECKPOINT WITH THE SPIKEY THORNS WON’T AFFECT THE GAMEPLAY

The game id designed with a strategy of mid-level difficulty in the beginning and would get harder as you come across new levels

Some of the levels would have reverse gravity. Keep patience to empower your gaming experience. Wait for right moves and intend to meet the moving character and the checkpoint

The gravity would work upside down in the entire gameplay

The melodious music suits the gameplay crafted with beautiful minimalist art level designing

You can use the in-app purchase to play the entire gameplay for no ads.

Thank you for all your support. Download now and challenge yourself!!
